## JHS event

```{r}
mesa_event <- read.csv("/Users/cxt/Documents/research/CVD/Effect-of-nSES-on-CVD/Data/MESA/outcomes/event.csv") 
```

```{r}
mesa_event <- mesa_event %>%
  mutate(cvd_event = case_when(
    # If any of CHD, STROKE, HARDCHD, or HF, cvd_event = 1
    mi == 1 | strk == 1 | chdh == 1 | chda == 1 | chf == 1 ~ 1,

    # If all of CHD, STROKE, HARDCHD, and hf are NA
    is.na(mi) & is.na(strk) & is.na(chdh) & is.na(chda) & is.na(chf)~ NA_integer_,

    # Otherwise
    TRUE ~ 0
  )) %>%
  mutate(cvd_event_t = case_when(
    cvd_event == 1 ~ pmin(mitt, strktt, chdhtt, chdatt, chftt, na.rm = TRUE),
    TRUE ~ NA_real_  # Assign NA for cases where cvd_event != 1
  )) %>%
  filter(!is.na(cvd_event)) %>%
  mutate(cvd_10y = case_when(
      cvd_event == 1 & cvd_event_t <= 3650 ~ 1,
      TRUE ~ 0  # Otherwise, set cvd_10y to 0
    ))

```

```{r}
sum(mesa_event$cvd_10y)
```

write.csv(mesa_event, "../data_processed/MESA/mesa_event_combined.csv", row.names = FALSE)
